articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy smart ring to track sleep and periods - BBC.com
articles.description: The devices have high profile users, including Kim Kardashian and and some England footballers.
articles.content:
By Liv McMahon & Imran Rahman-Jones, Technology reporters
The company says its ring can be used for sleep tracking
Samsung is hoping to lure fitness and health-tracking technology lovers with i… [+3296 chars]
